modules.name: Signature Series Splort
modules.description: 16 channels polyphonic split with optional linkable sort mode

modules.name: Signature Series Smerge
modules.description: 16 channels polyphonic merge with optional linkable sort mode

modules.name: Signature Series Darius
modules.description: Branching 8-step sequencer taking a random path through its nodes

modules.name: Signature Series Undular
modules.description: Scroll the rack via CV for live performance. If locked by mistake: Engine > Sample Rate > Pause
